turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizzas from Donatello's Pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is this the Donatello's Pizza in Salem Oregon at 3981 Commercial St SE?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two large pizzas please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one Linguica pizza, and one with pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's one Linguica and one pepperoni?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sides with your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One order of Jalapeno Poppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And anything to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what's the name for the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Steven.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Steven. I have one large Linguica pizza, one large pepperoni pizza, and a side of Jalapeno Poppers. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. The order total will be $47.25

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pickup in approximately 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, bye.

items.name: Salem Oregon at 3981 Commercial St SE
